FuncDef:
The ripng split-horizon command enables split horizon for RIPng Update packets.
The undo ripng split-horizon command disables split horizon for RIPng Update packets. The ripng split-horizon command enables split horizon for RIPng Update packets. The undo ripng split-horizon command disables split horizon for RIPng Update packets. By default, split horizon is enabled on broadcast and Point-to-Point (P2P) interfaces and disabled on Non Broadcast Multiple Access (NBMA) and Point-to-Multipoint (P2MP) interfaces.

ExtraInfo:
Split horizon is used to prevent routing loops. It prevents routes learned from an interface from being advertised through this interface.
By default, split horizon is enabled for RIPng. Disabling split horizon is not recommended.
